summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5794 for the improvement of Shelton Street, from Corson Avenue to Swift Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76389 as amended by Ordinance No. 76838 and 77343, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
